ratings.comment: Professor Sieger is a great lecturer and puts effort into engaging students in the content. It is easy to do well in this class as long as you keep up with the readings and complete assignments on time.

I LOVED this professor! You can tell she's passionate about what she teaches and actually cares about any questions you may have. As long as you participate in discussions and actually read the textbook then you'll be fine. No midterm, no finals; The four essays we did were only two paragraphs and the quiz questions came straight from the books.

No exams, no final. 5 quizzes, discussion participation, and 4 short essays comprise the entire grade for the class. Show up, listen to the lectures, and ask questions if you need to. Easy class overall, and Prof Sieger does a great job at explaining information in a palatable (and funny) manner. Class discussions are super productive!
